name: Plasma Pistol
description: A compact energy sidearm that fires superheated plasma bolts. Standard issue for corporate security. Deals moderate energy damage.

name: Laser Rifle
description: A long-range rifle that fires focused laser beams. High accuracy and armor penetration.

name: Mono-molecular Blade
description: A sword with an edge only one molecule thick. Can cut through most materials.

name: Stun Baton
description: A melee baton that delivers a powerful electric shock, capable of incapacitating targets.

name: Nano-weave Vest
description: A lightweight vest reinforced with nanofibers. Provides protection against small arms fire.

name: Powered Exosuit
description: A full-body powered suit that enhances strength and provides heavy protection.

name: Stealth Cloak
description: A cloak with active camouflage technology, making the wearer nearly invisible.

name: Medkit
description: A portable kit containing medical supplies for treating injuries and stabilizing wounds.

name: Energy Cell
description: A compact battery used to power energy weapons and devices.

name: Holo-Projector
description: A device that projects realistic 3D holograms for communication or distraction.

name: Hacking Rig
description: A portable computer with specialized tools for bypassing electronic security.

name: Rations
description: Packaged food and water for survival in hostile environments.

name: Backpack
description: A sturdy pack for carrying equipment and supplies.

name: Commlink
description: A secure personal communicator for voice, text, and data.

name: EMP Grenade
description: A grenade that emits an electromagnetic pulse, disabling electronics in a small radius.

name: Jet Boots
description: Boots with built-in thrusters for short bursts of flight or rapid movement.

name: Synthetic ID
description: A forged identity chip for bypassing security checks and accessing restricted areas.

name: Universal Translator
description: A device that translates spoken and written language in real time.

name: Portable Shelter
description: A compact shelter that expands to provide protection from the elements.

name: Drone Companion
description: A small autonomous drone that can assist with surveillance, repairs, or combat.

name: Omni-tool
description: A multi-purpose handheld device for repairs, diagnostics, and interfacing with technology.

name: Repair Drone
description: A drone specialized in repairing machinery and electronic systems.

name: Welding Torch
description: A portable torch for cutting and welding metal. Useful for repairs and breaching obstacles.

name: Smart Goggles
description: Wearable goggles with augmented reality overlays and diagnostic tools.

name: Nanite Canister
description: A canister containing programmable nanites for repairs or sabotage.

name: Circuit Patch Kit
description: A kit with spare parts and tools for quick electronic repairs.

name: Portable Fabricator
description: A portable 3D printer for creating tools, parts, or small devices on demand.

name: Sensor Array
description: A suite of sensors for detecting heat, motion, radiation, and other phenomena.

name: EMP Shielding Module
description: A module that protects devices and vehicles from EMP attacks.

name: Cyberdeck
description: A powerful portable computer for hacking networks and systems. Essential for netrunners.

name: ICE Breaker
description: A software or device designed to defeat Intrusion Countermeasures Electronics (ICE).

name: Signal Jammer
description: A device that disrupts wireless communications in a given area.

name: Data Spike
description: A malicious program or device used to damage or disrupt enemy systems.

name: Cloaking Chip
description: A chip that masks the user's digital presence, making them harder to trace.

name: Neural Interface Jack
description: A cybernetic implant that allows direct brain-to-computer interfacing.

name: Spoof Card
description: A device that fakes credentials or signals to bypass security.

name: Black ICE Injector
description: A tool for deploying lethal countermeasures in cyberspace.

name: Encrypted Datapad
description: A secure, tamper-resistant device for storing sensitive data.

name: Wireless Tap
description: A device for intercepting and monitoring wireless communications.
